name: TrickStyle
description: Grab your board, surf through the air, show your stuff, and win eternal glory with your off-the-chain skills. Re-Live this Dreamcast Classic Today!

recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2+ Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
